name: 2016 International Conference on Water Pollution Control Engineering
content: WPCE 2016 aims to cover a wide range of topics in the intersection of Water Pollution Control Engineering and to provide an effective platform for discussions between the academic and industrial researches and applications. Apart from sessions that will present new research results, tutorials and special sessions will be offered as well. Papers describing original work are invited in the general fields covered by WPCE, with an emphasis on the topics listed below. Accepted papers will be published in the Proceedings of WPCE 2016 and will be indexed by Ei compendex, Scopus and other database. Acceptance will be based on quality, relevance, and originality.
